org.json.zip

Class Compressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.json.zip.JSONzip
      • org.json.zip.Compressor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    None, PostMortem

    public class Compressor
extends JSONzip
    A compressor implements the compression behavior of JSONzip. It provides a zip method that takes a JSONObject or JSONArray and delivers a stream of bits to a BitWriter. FOR EVALUATION PURPOSES ONLY. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN TESTED ADEQUATELY FOR PRODUCTION USE.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.json.zip.None

    • Constructor Detail

      • Compressor

        public Compressor(BitWriter bitwriter)
        Create a new compressor. It may be used for an entire session or subsession.
        Parameters:
        bitwriter - The BitWriter this Compressor will output to. Don't forget to flush.

    • Method Detail

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws JSONException
        Finish the final byte and flush the bitwriter. This does the same thing as pad(8).
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • pad

        public void pad(int factor)
         throws JSONException
        Pad the output to fill an allotment of bits.
        Parameters:
        factor - The size of the bit allotment. A value of 8 will complete and flush the current byte. If you don't pad, then some of the last bits might not be sent to the Output Stream.
        Throws:
        JSONException

      • zip

        public void zip(JSONObject jsonobject)
         throws JSONException
        Compress a JSONObject.
        Parameters:
        jsonobject -
        Throws:
        JSONException

         throws JSONException
        Compress a JSONArray.
        Parameters:
        jsonarray -
        Throws:
        JSONException
